oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Organic Market in Europe – Results of a Survey of the OrganicDataNetwork Project
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Willer, Helga
Schaack, Diana
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Surveys and statistics
Markets and trade
Europe
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper presents some of the results of the first European survey on detailed organic market data that was carried out as part of the project "Data network for better European organic market information" (OrganicDataNetwork). The project is running from 2012 to 2014 and is funded under the 7th Framework programme for Research and Technological Development of the European Commission. The project aims to increase the transparency of the European organic food market through better availability of market intelligence about the sector to meet the needs of policy makers and actors involved in organic markets.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Willer, Helga and Schaack, Diana (2014) The Organic Market in Europe – Results of a Survey of the OrganicDataNetwork Project. In: Rahmann, G. and Aksoy, U. (Eds.) Building Organic Bridges, Johann Heinrich von Thünen-Institut, Braunschweig, Germany, 4, Thuenen Report, no. 20, pp. 1015-1018.
